summary: A letter from a victim to the FBI's Sexual Offenses, Exploitation and Abuse Investigation Command, formally authorizing attorneys David Boies and Sigrid McCawley to act as legal representatives and serve as the primary point of contact for arranging an interview with the FBI. The letter confirms the victim's ongoing representation by Paul Cassell and Brad Edwards.

persons.name: David Boies
persons.context: Introduced as an additional attorney representing the victim, from the law firm Boies, Schiller & Flexner LLP.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Introduced as an additional attorney representing the victim, designated as the primary point of contact to interface with the FBI and coordinate with the victim's other lawyers.

persons.name: Paul Cassell
persons.context: Confirmed as continuing to represent the victim alongside Brad Edwards.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Confirmed as continuing to represent the victim alongside Paul Cassell.

connections.description: Both are attorneys from the same law firm (Boies, Schiller & Flexner LLP) representing the same client.
McCawley is authorized to handle communication with the victim's other lawyers, including Cassell.
McCawley is authorized to handle communication with the victim's other lawyers, including Edwards.
Both are attorneys who continue to jointly represent the victim.

events.title: Prior Correspondence to FBI
events.description: The victim sent a prior correspondence to the FBI's Sexual Offenses, Exploitation and Abuse Investigation Command.

events.title: FBI Request for Confirmation
events.description: The FBI indicated in correspondence that they wanted confirmation of the victim's legal representation and that all communication should go through attorneys.

events.title: Formal Authorization of Attorneys
events.description: The victim formally authorizes David Boies and Sigrid McCawley as legal representatives and designates McCawley as the primary FBI contact.

locations: 401 East Las Olas Blvd., Suite 1200, Fort Lauderdale, Florida 33301
keyFacts: The document is a formal authorization from a victim to the FBI, confirming legal representation by a team of attorneys including David Boies and Sigrid McCawley.
Sigrid McCawley is designated as the primary point of contact to interface with the FBI and coordinate with the victim's other lawyers, Paul Cassell and Brad Edwards.
The correspondence is addressed to the FBI's 'Sexual Offenses, Exploitation and Abuse Investigation Command,' indicating an active federal investigation into sexual crimes.
The document references prior correspondence from August 2015, showing an ongoing dialogue between the victim and the FBI regarding the investigation.
